mapper.select: SELECT propertyname FROM `commodity` GROUP BY propertyname

SELECT utheircomm.*,role.`discount`,`user`.`username`,commodity.* FROM `utheircomm`,`user`,role,commodity WHERE utheircomm.`userid` = `user`.`userid` AND `user`.`roleid`=role.`roleid` AND utheircomm.`commodityid`=commodity.`commodityid`
AND commodity.`commodityname` like CONCAT('%',#{commodityname},'%')
